content.label:
Game pad rumble (iOS 14 feature)
120 fps support

This games needs some work; crashes a lot causing you to lose all progress since last autosave (it can be a lot). Long missions cause it to run very slowly. No option to make all equipment available!! You have to manually go to soldiers; unequip and equip, a step back from enemy within. This is made for specific OS and hardware unlike pc, how hard is it to make it not crash?

This was my first time playing XCOM 2, and I was thoroughly enjoying it on iOS until a save data corruption prevented the game from progressing after 5-10 hours of play. Feral could recreate the bug I encountered, but have no proposed fix except for starting over. Even reverting to a prior save was a no-go. 

To avoid similar dead ends cropping back up, I‚Äôm looking to play on other platforms that are more reliable and properly QA‚Äôed.

name.label: The nickiest name of them all

content.label: I bought it because I have an I phone 7 but apparently it has to be specifically an iPhone 7 Plus and the refuse to let you play the game unless its the supported device. Meaning I have $20 in the hole and 8 gigs of dead space on my phone now. I had a lot of faith in Feral after the company of heroes launch but this is pretty disappointing.
Anyone else have this issue?
do not buy this game because it won‚Äôt work on your iPhone as soon as you try too start it up it well say this device is not supported but you can buy it in the App Store it not really

title.label: Best turn based game ever made.

content.label: Glad to see an update concerning iCloud syncing. I lost all my save game data and had to restart it.

Let me say that this game is awesome, and is a perfect addition to the XCOM franchise. The graphics are on point, the interface is perfect, and the progression is excellent. 

However, I am having difficulty of late because the game keeps crashing. It didn‚Äôt start doing this until a few days ago, and it is very frustrating. I am playing on an iPad Pro 10.5 inch. I would like to see a fix to this. Once that happens I will give 5 stars.
Best iPad game EVER.  I just wish it supported customizing the head of soldiers.  I hate the look of so many of the defaults.

Playing with my iPad Pro 2018. The device was heating so bad that it had to dim the brightness from time to time to prevent overheating, which was really annoying, 

Also, in the mission which I need to defend ship from UFO invasion and destroy the tower, I cannot destroy the tower which had infinite HP. This is an annoying bug which I hope you can fix. 

FYI, I enabled double HP and double timer setting.

Been waiting for this to be ported to iOS for a long time! My computer‚Äôs too old to play the game, and I don‚Äôt feel like buying a new console just for this. Been playing since the day it came out, and I love it! Definitely way ahead of the first game, which now seems a little bland and repetitive. Wasn‚Äôt sure how to switch floor views at first and had to contact support (it‚Äôs the slider on the right side of the screen), and a little annoyed that you can‚Äôt flip the view (I‚Äôm used to the port being on the right). But overall I‚Äôm happy with it. Also happy that, unlike the port of the first game, you can save as many times as you want without having to delete previous games (I‚Äôm at 300 saves already). Maybe old saves are being deleted, I don‚Äôt know and don‚Äôt really care. Anyway, worth every penny!

iPhone 12 Mini

I‚Äôm unable to exit to the mission deploy screen after customizing a character‚Äôs loadout/appearance before launch.

The ‚Äúback‚Äù button is grayed out.

Else-wise, it‚Äôs excellent.

Love the game amazing port y‚Äôall did a wonderful job, just having a hard time climbing ladders, any specific way my to do it? I tried zooming out and tapping roof and tried tapping arrow on ladder, still no luck

title.label: AAA Game for Mobile?? Yes, please!

content.label:
This is a desktop/console quality game that works great on a touch device. It‚Äôs definitely not an easy game, but it‚Äôs deep and detailed and even after only a few days, I can tell that it‚Äôs a game with a lot of replayability. The port to mobile is really amazing ‚Äî everything runs fluidly on my 2018 iPad Pro, and it‚Äôs really delightful to swipe and tap around. 

Even better, the flat price includes DLC that cost like twice as much on other platforms, and makes the game even more complex. You can approach missions through stealth or just go ahead and blow up everything in sight, and that‚Äôs not even getting into hacking or mind control stuff.

title.label: Amazing game how is it any less then 5 stars

content.label: Beautifully done for mobile game, massive applause

As of Nov 14th, the downloadable content won‚Äôt download 
Game won‚Äôt run

The game will start crashing mid way through. 
iPhone 11 Pro Max 40gb free. Please fix crashing.  There aren‚Äôt many games this expensive and those ones polish to stop crashing. Please Help!!!!
I Love This Game!!

title.label: Great game but my device is not compatible

content.label: No worries to the developers I plan on upgrading my device so this is a small inconvenience to me, but to all people that are thinking of the purchase, if your device can handle it do it you won‚Äôt regret it, awesome game and has great replay value.

X-Com 2 is a superb game and it runs really well on the iPhone 11 Pro. The controls feel right at home. Love it. 

Only question: Can it be updated to allow us to switch the screen orientation? It‚Äôs minor but would be appreciated. Could easily have the screen setup to handle the notch based on which way the user holds their phone.

This game is amazing it‚Äôs fun challenging and has an immersive environment! However it crashes on my iPad 8 all the time I‚Äôm stuck on my current mission I only get a turn or,2 in before it crashes. At least 15 times a day it crashes. Hope it gets fixed so I can make it to the next mission.

title.label: Please optimize for the M1 chip

content.label: Please don‚Äôt. Double dip. It‚Äôs $50 on the Mac store and $25 on the app. Please optimize for  the M1 so we can enjoy the game to the fullest thank you.

title.label: Great game, worst movement I‚Äôve ever seen

content.label: You literally can‚Äôt climb ladders, over an hour right now trying to climb a ladder, gave the phone to 3 other people who have played XCOM for years, they can‚Äôt can‚Äôt figure it out either. iPhone 12 pro.
works like a charm on my ipad 12.9
Can you PLEASE make it so the screen can rotate 180 degrees? Great game but I keep hitting the dang sleep button on my iPhone. When fixed I‚Äôll up to 5 stars.

To the prospective buyer: I would have paid double for this game. It‚Äôs hard to imagine a thrilling turn based game that keeps you glued to the screen yet able to moderate the pace of the game. With that being said, I lost lots of sleep for this game. 

Got the pre order. Got the download. Played through over a several days. Thrilling extension of the universe. Storyline gave me chills at several occasions. Perfect blend of patience, trial by fire, and excitement. 

To the developers: Couldn‚Äôt imagine a better continuation of the universe. I am already itching for the next installment!!!!!!! From balancing conflicting priorities to streamlining the ultimate path to victory, I was never frustrated or bored. Please keep it up devs, publishers, designers, and all others.

title.label: Best platform to mobile I‚Äôve played

content.label:
The game actually works better on my iPhone 11 Promax than it ever did on my PS4. The double tap confirmation for movement is easy to use, only an occasional grenade/movement confirmation mishap. Changing camera level to see rooftops and double click to move is easy to get used to (these were the major complaints I saw before putting up the money). 

Game hasn‚Äôt crashed once and best part is when I do throw grenade in wrong spot or accidentally* run out of concealment, I can reload the last save in a fraction of the time it took my PS4. Probably why I think it‚Äôs so much better (kind of a perfectionist) Awesome game made better on mobile! Good job

On my new iPhone 12, the game:
1. Loads really fast. 
2. Performs extremely well (slight texture pop-in during some cutscene transitions). 
3. Has a redone interface that‚Äôs works perfectly for phones. 
4. Makes my phone warm but not hot. 
5. Also happens to be one of the best tactics/strategy games of the last 20 years. 
Seriously, besides some questionable graphics downscaling annoyances (why are the hair textures so bad?) this port DELIVERS.
PLEASE FIX THE AUDIO RESETTING TO QUIET VOLUME ON SCENE CHANGE BUG.

I love this game. 

Two questions:

1. Can you offer better graphics for XCom2?

2. Will you ever make a Medieval2 for mobile?

One of my favorite games ever on console, faithfully ported to iOS! I‚Äôve played just a few missions (I‚Äôll update with any difficulties) but already very happy with the rendering, speed, and gameplay (is it possible that the difficulty is higher than Xbox?). For those new to XCOM‚Äîdon‚Äôt wait; it‚Äôs the finest turn-based tRPG ever. Worth the investment.

UPDATE: Completed my first play-through, using Commander difficulty. Some lag at times & a couple of crashes along the way, but LESS LAG and FEWER crashes than I experience on Xbox One. (I‚Äôm using iPhone X, iOS 14.1.) Touch controls are good (but the optional ‚ÄúMove‚Äù button and the height slider on missions are musts, and navigating the world screen can be a pain). I‚Äôm starting my first Commander Ironman play-through, which I wouldn‚Äôt even attempt on Xbox because of the certainty of crashes on big Lost missions. Well done, Feral!

I am unable to make the  soldiers move

I double click on the destination but nothing happens

The game  downloaded perfectly and when I open it all  is well until I try to move someone

After change to the move button rather than the double tap

The game appears to be working ok
Can u add mods?
So on the App Store it says it works on my iPhone but when I open the app it‚Äôs says my device is not supported.

App say compatible with my iPad, I exceed os and memory requirements, then I buy the game and totally load it up and the first thing it tell me is my iPad cannot sustain the game.  ENTRAPMENT MUCH!!!.  Game will not play correctly.  Buyer beware.
I normally don‚Äôt endorse apps/games but they crushed it on this, well done devs mad respect. Never thought it was possible to make this play well on mobile but you guys did it well done.

I have the game for PC and I love it. I‚Äôve been waiting for XCOM 2 on mobile and I am blown away. If you love the game on PC and want it on the go, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. 

The only little issue I have is not being able to flip the screen when I flip my phone. I know it‚Äôs silly, but I‚Äôm just so used to holding my phone that way. If there is a fix for this I hope to see it in an upcoming update. Regardless, awesome game!!
How do i save? Every time i play this game my progress always erases

The double tap to move my character doesn‚Äôt work. The game, for me, doesn‚Äôt work. By reading reviews, I‚Äôve noticed this is a common problem. The proposed solution is to go into options and select the ‚Äúon-sceeen move button.‚Äù That doesn‚Äôt work either!!!

I hope this gets fixed soon, or this game is a complete waste of my $25. Can I get a refund?
If you have ever played any of these strategy games and like them, you will love this one.  Very well done.

Was going to purchase this on the Switch but very shortly after I looked into it I saw this was coming to iOS. Runs like a dream on an Air 3 - initial loading is a bit pokey, but once it‚Äôs going it‚Äôs SO FAST. Handles like a dream, like others say loading between missions is so speedy. 

Honestly never thought this would come to the platform, and man, so happy it‚Äôs here. Fingers crossed for multiplayer, but even if it doesn‚Äôt happen still looking forward to sinking many, many hours into this.

I have all the required specs and I does crash every once and a while but on a mission with a ton of ‚Äúthe lost‚Äù units. It keeps crashing with the high npc count. Hopefully the devs can optimize this.
Need to move through the mission but you can‚Äôt swap the medkit for grenade.  I pressed the hand in upper left corner, double pressed on both items.  Please fix this!

I‚Äôm playing on an iPhone xr, and I am unable to walk upstairs or on roofs due to the current movement system. It highly prioritizes ground movement and there is no way to adjust, even if the camera is originally focused on a roof. Please let me know if there is already a fix. Cant play until this is fixed :(

I just wanted to do a quick review after the first mission. I also own this on the Switch. Graphics look great and the cut scenes are terrific too. The sounds and voice overs are exactly the way they should be. It‚Äôs the complete game with all DLC included. The interface works great and the tutorial teaches you everything you need to know. Even though I have a Controller I started the game using finger gestures and it worked very well. Compared to the Switch the larger screen is nice and playing it on the go will work out great. It totaled a little over 8 gb on my iPad. It plays fantastically and nothing took me out of the experience. Yes I know it was just the first mission, but I‚Äôve played further on the Switch version and this version on the bigger portable screen rocked. I‚Äôll update my review after a few more missions. By the way: Feral Interactive who released this game do absolutely fantastic work. Look at their awesome library of games on the iPad. I own them all and they are all superb. And no they didn‚Äôt pay me to say this the games are just that good. Update: I‚Äôm two more missions in and it plays great. No problems so far. It‚Äôs smooth and plays like X-Com should. Great cut scenes, voice over and graphics. Highly recommended. By the way I‚Äôm playing on an iPad 10.5 inch from 2017. Everything you‚Äôd want in a portable X-Com on your iPad is here.

title.label: I hope I can support more models

content.label: I saw in the introduction that I can support iPhone 8ÔºåHowever, I can't open it after payment and download, which makes me very embarrassed. It took me a long time to download it. I have been playing it for 200 hours on the computer. I heard that this game can be played on Apple 8, which makes me look forward to it. The result actually cannot run. I hope that it can be optimized and updated to adapt to more models, including iPhone8.

Love XCOM 2 but have always modded on my PC to get rid of fatigue as I preferred the vanilla game play to the WOTC on that one point. Would be wonderful if the developers could add a option to remove fatigue from the game. 
Would also like to see online vs. added.
Runs as smooth as silk on my iPhone 8plus.

title.label: Works great on iPad 11, was waiting for so long ü§©ü§©

content.label: Compared to the PC version, textures are turned down to about 20% of the original graphics. It is still very enjoyable. I wish they had made an option for increasing the graphics settings. Please do it with upcoming updates, developers. Thank you!
It‚Äôs a perfect port, I love this game! But I have one question, dose this game include the dlc pack ‚ÄúTactical Legacy Pack‚Äù, if not, any plan to add this in the future?
